question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Na którym brzegu rzeki znajduje się centrum Uppsali w Szwecji?
answer: Centrum Uppsali w Szwecji znajduje się na wschodnim brzegu rzeki Fyrisån.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is located on the east bank of the Fyrisån River.
